import React from 'react'; import { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext'; import '../components/dashboard.css'; import { FaUsers, FaBuilding, FaCalendarCheck, FaUserCheck } from 'react-icons/fa'; const Dashboard = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); if (!user) { return (

Loading...

); } return (

Welcome back, {user?.name}! ðŸ‘‹

Total Employees
1

Join Date
{new Date(user?.joinDate).toLocaleDateString()}

Admin Privileges

Manage all employees and their records
Create and manage departments
View and manage attendance reports
Configure system settings and permissions
)} {user?.role === 'Employee' && (

Employee Dashboard

View and update your personal information
Check your attendance records and history
View department updates and announcements
)}
); }; export default Dashboard;
